pages.text: Inventory lists show you exactly what's inside the warehouse and those are craftable(see $(l:maid_storage_manager/craft)Auto Craft(/l)). $(br2) Crafting an empty inventory list, or resetting a written inventory list on the workbench, and giving it to the maid (throw it to her, right-click on her, or even open your backpack and put it in!) $(br) After writing it, the maid will throw the inventory list out.

pages.title: Looking for something
pages.text: When viewing the inventory list, you can click on an item to have its storage location marked, which is very handy when looking for items. $(br2)Tips:You can press 'See-Through Mark Box'($(k:maid_storage_manager.see_through_mark_box)) to see through the highlight boxes, this function is also available to other highlight boxes in this mod.
Tip: If you have an [Inventory List] in your backpack, when fill recipe from JEI/EMI, it will prioritise items that are available in large quantities in the warehouse or that can be crafted.
